message: Thanks for Signing Up with our Onboarding system. Our Sales team will be in touch with you soon.
Please enter First Name. It can't be blank.
Please enter Last Name. It can't be blank.
Please enter E-Mail ID. It can't be blank.
Format of the E-mail ID is incorrect. Please enter the valid E-mail ID.
Please enter Phone#. It can't be blank.
Format of the Phone# is incorrect. Please enter the valid Phone#.
Please select Client Name. It can't be blank.
The entered e-mail ID is already used for Signup by some other user. Please enter a new e-mail ID.
The entered Phone# is already used for Signup by some other user. Please enter a new Phone#.
Please enter Password. It can't be blank.
Format of the Password is incorrect. Please enter the valid Password.
